title: The Superhero of Small Things
description: Tired of being trodden on? Tired of seeing bad people getting away with murder? Tired of being a victim?Itâ€™s time to fight back.My name is Emily.One day, I read a news report about a kitten being tortured and hurled to its death from a tower block. The person who did this was a 17 year old girl. She was cautioned and banned for keeping animals for 5 years. She received a small fine. This is what a life is worth in our world.She got away with murder.I decided to do something about it. I carried out an anonymous, random act of vengeance. I restored some balance to the world.Since then, I have continued to punish those who make society a worse place for the rest of us. As word of mouth spread, I noticed that other people were beginning to act in the same way. It turns out there are millions of us out there, hiding in the shadows, eager to fight back against the scum.Random Acts of Vengeance.www.fight-the-scum.co.ukRead my story.Join us.
author: Steve Roach
